tool.name: LabeledEval
tool.description: Evaluation tool for isotope-labeled quantitation experiments.
tool.command:
LabeledEval
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_truth: -truth $param_truth #end if #if $param_rt_tol: -rt_tol $param_rt_tol #end if #if $param_mz_tol: -mz_tol $param_mz_tol #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if > $param_stdout

param.name: param_mz_tol
param.label: Maximum allowed m/z deviation (divided by charge)

tool.help:
Evaluation tool for isotope-labeled quantitation experiments.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_LabeledEval.html
